plot: Eli's attempt to relieve Melinda of ghost duty so she can pursue her romance with Jim/Sam goes awry when a hazing stunt turns deadly, and Sam wonders if he can trust her.

Just now Melinda wants to concentrate on winning Jim 'Sam' back, Eli can't handle the mystery of Rebecca Kelly's ghost, which is obsessed with her former sorority's harsh hazing. The ghost seems bent on seeing a pledge die, but her past rather suggests motives to oppose the harm done by hazers.—KGF Vissers
